ISSUE.TITLE: Application Transport Security (ATS) check of iOS Apps gives wrong results
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ## EXPLANATION OF THE ISSUE MobSF (current code as of 3. April 2017) declares the Application Transport Security settings as secure even if "NSAllowsArbitraryLoads" is defined as True in the info.plist of the targeted iOS app. ## STEPS TO REPRODUCE THE ISSUE Open an app with ATS set to NSAllowsArbitraryLoads=true. Analyze with MobSF and see the results.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Application Transport Security (ATS) check of iOS Apps gives wrong results #385
